channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Fonts Plugin | Google Fonts Typography
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Fonts Plugin | Google Fonts Typography

item.title: CVE-2021-24637|2024-08-03T19:35:20.271Z -- unknown -- fonts%20plugin%20%7C%20google%20fonts%20typography
item.description: The Google Fonts Typography WordPress plugin before 3.0.3 does not escape and sanitise some of its block settings, allowing users with as role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks via blockType (combined with content), align, color, variant and fontID argument of a Gutenberg block.
